title: 10 Troubleshooting Tips for Traditional Jam Making
description: 10 tips for troubleshooting when making traditional jam and jelly without store bought pectin. Learn how to get your jam to set and what might be causing the problem.
content:encoded: 10 tips for troubleshooting when making traditional jam and jelly without store bought pectin. Learn how to get your jam to set and what might be causing the problem.
itunes:subtitle: 10 tips for troubleshooting when making traditional jam and jelly without store bought pectin. Learn how to get your jam to set and what might be causing the problem.
author: melissa@melissaknorris.com (Melissa K. Norris 5th Generation Homesteader)
